text: The Telemedicine Act 1997 (), is a Malaysian law enacted to provide for the regulation and control of the practice of telemedicine and for matters connected therewith. ==Structure== The Telemedicine Act 1997, in its current form (30 June 1997), consists of 6 sections and no schedule (including no amendment), without separate Part. *Section 1: Short title and commencement *Section 2: Interpretation *Section 3: Persons who may practise telemedicine *Section 4: Certificate to practise telemedicine *Section 5: Patient's consent *Section 6: Regulations ==References== ==External links== * Telemedicine Act 1997 Category:1997 in Malaysian law Category:Malaysian federal legislation
title: Telemedicine Act 1997
